statements: UPDATE Interactions SET response = 'Hello, how can I assist you?' WHERE interaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Interactions SET interaction_type = 'query', user_id = '987e6543-e21b-34c5-d876-432198765432', timestamp = NOW() WHERE interaction_id = '456e7891-a34c-57d8-b210-987654321987';
UPDATE Interactions SET response='Thank you for your feedback.' WHERE interaction_id='b92d2f8f-7e66-4d8e-9d19-33c3c9f34410';

UPDATE Interactions SET user_id='5e5d1436-48bc-4c29-b79b-2768068be166', assistant_id='1bb12c1e-421f-4e2e-95a4-2b8db7a51978', timestamp='2023-04-15 10:30:00', response='Please provide more details.' WHERE interaction_id='215b8425-4be1-4340-9cb9-3e4c5d24401e';
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_data = 'Updated Data' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE assistant_responses SET response_text = 'New Response' WHERE response_id = 3;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_timestamp = '2023-01-01 12:00:00', interaction_type = 'click' WHERE interaction_id = 1 AND user_id = 101;
UPDATE assistant_responses SET response_text = 'I have received your message. Will get back to you soon.' WHERE response_id = 2;
UPDATE interactions SET message = 'Hello, how can I assist you?' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE interactions SET message = 'Updated message for interaction 1' WHERE interaction_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type='Question' WHERE interaction_id=1;
UPDATE assistant_responses SET response_text='Thank you for your question' WHERE interaction_id=1;
UPDATE user_interactions SET interaction_type='comment', interaction_time='2022-01-10 12:30:00' WHERE interaction_id=1001

UPDATE assistant_responses SET response_text='Thank you for your comment.', response_time='2022-01-10 12:35:00' WHERE interaction_id=(SELECT interaction_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type='comment' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 1)
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_content = 'Clicked on button' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Responses SET response_content = 'Message sent successfully' WHERE interaction_id = 3;
UPDATE UserInteractions SET interaction_type = 'Like' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Responses SET response_content = 'Thank you for your feedback' WHERE id = 5;
